artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Published by Hamadaya Tokubei
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
marks: in toshidama cartouche: 豊國画 {Toyokuni ga}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
text: Related to the play Narukami 鳴神, performed at the Ichimura Theater, 1851, 5th month.
title: The Actors Ichikawa Danjūrō VIII as Narukami Shōnin, Arashi Kichisaburō III as Hakuunbō, Ōtani Tomoemon IV as Kokuunbō, Ichikawa Kuzō II as Sekiunbō, Ichikawa Komazō VII as Seiunbō, Bandō Shuka I as Kumo no Taema
